sourcesContent:
<template>
  <cus-wraper>
    <cus-page-title-back :isDialog="true" :label="$t('ppDiscountFormulaSelect.pdDisCountCalcMenu')" @backTo="back"/>
    <el-form ref="productForm" :model="productPpForm" label-width="auto">
      <el-row :gutter="10">
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('ppDiscountFormulaSelect.product')">
            <el-tag type="info">{{ productPpForm.ppCode + ':' + productPpForm.ppName }}</el-tag>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('ppDiscountFormulaSelect.ppCmlnType')">
            <cus-radio v-model="productPpForm.pdCmpnCode" :codetype="'ppCmpType'" :disabled="true">
            </cus-radio>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
        <el-col :span="8">
          <el-form-item :label="$t('ppDiscountFormulaSelect.ppCmlnName')">
            <el-tag type="info">{{ productPpForm.pdcode }}</el-tag>
          </el-form-item>
        </el-col>
      </el-row>
    </el-form>

    <el-button icon="el-icon-connection" size="small" type="primary" @click="toSelectFormula">
      {{ $t('pdDiscountFormula.selectFormula') }}
    </el-button>

    <cus-table-title :label="$t('pdDiscountFormula.pdDiscountFormula')"/>
    <el-table ref="formulaList" :data="formulaList" border element-loading-text="Loading" fit highlight-current-row
              max-height="250" size="mini">
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.select')" width="50">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-radio-group v-model="selectedFormula" @change="selectedFormulaChanged">
            <el-radio :label="scope.row">{{ '' }}</el-radio>
          </el-radio-group>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('ppDiscountFormulaSelect.index')" align="center" type="index"
                       width="50"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('ppDiscountFormulaSelect.details')" align="center" width="100">
        <template slot-scope="scope">
          <el-button size="small" type="text" @click="showFormula(scope.row.pdCalcCode)">>></el-button>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('ppDiscountFormulaSelect.pdBussDetailType')" align="center" prop="pdBussDetailType">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.pdBussDetailType | filter_pdBussDetailType }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('ppDiscountFormulaSelect.pdCalcCode')" align="center"
                       prop="pdCalcCode"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('ppDiscountFormulaSelect.pdCalcDesc')" align="center"
                       prop="pdCalcDesc"></el-table-column>
      <el-table-column align="center" :label="$t('rule.ruleAttr')">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          {{ scope.row.ruleAttr === '1' ? $t('rule.general') : (scope.row.ruleAttr === '2' ? $t('rule.individual') : '') }}
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column :label="$t('table.actions')" align="center" width="150">
        <template v-slot="scope">
          <cus-del-btn v-auth="'pdtemp-pd-discount-formula:delete'" @ok="handleDeleteFormula(scope.row)"></cus-del-btn>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <cus-pagination ref="page" v-model="formulaList" :autoBuild="false" :pageSize="10"
                    :params="params" url="/pd-pp-premiumDiscount/base/search"/>

    <!-- 公式查看和决策树编辑弹窗 -->
    <cus-rule-modify :flag="formulaView.flag" :ruleCode="formulaView.ruleCode" :ruleModifyClosed="formulaViewClosed"
                     :ruleType="'2'" :visible="formulaView.visible"></cus-rule-modify>


  </cus-wraper>
</template>
<script>
import {deleteDiscountFormula} from "@/api/basicinfo/pdtempDiscountFormula"

let _this
export default {
  name: 'ppDiscountFormula',
  filters: {
    filter_pdBussType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('pdCalcBussType', code)
    },
    filter_pdBussDetailType(code) {
      return _this.getCodeName('ruleBusinessDetailClass', code)
    }
  },
  props: {
    ppDisCount: {
      type: Object,
      required: false,
      default: () => {
        return {}
      }
    }
  },
  data() {
    _this = this
    return {
      selectedFormula: {},
      formulaView: {
        flag: '',
        ruleCode: '',
        visible: false
      },
      product: {
        id: undefined,
        pdCode: '',
        pdEdition: '',
        pdVerId: undefined,
        pdSalechnl: '',
        pdName: '',
        pdShortname: '',
        pdEnName: '',
        pdShortEnName: '',
        operator: '',
        pdApplDate: undefined,
        pdProcessId: undefined,
        createTime: undefined,
        updateTime: undefined
      },
      params: {
        eq_pdInfoId: undefined,
        eq_pdBussType: '1',
        eq_pdBussDetailType: '40',
        eq_pdType: '2',
        eq_pdBussId: undefined
      },
      productOptionList: [],//产品数组
      premOptions: [],//缴费
      formulaList: [],
      productBigType: '',
      productForm: {
        productType: '',
        appointProduct: '',
        appointPrem: '',
        pdDisCountType: '',
        pdCalcCode: ''
      },
      rule: {
        ruleBussModuDeta: [{
          required: true,
          message: '请选择核保规则细类',
          trigger: 'change'
        }],
        description: [{
          required: true,
          message: '请输入公式描述',
          trigger: 'blur'
        }]
      },
      pdPpInfo: {
        id: '',
        ppCode: '',
        ppName: '',
        ppType: '',//类型
        ppPlanName: '',
        ppPlanCode: '',
        ppPersonNum: '',
      },
      productPpForm: {
        id: '',//套餐ID
        ppCode: '',//套餐编码
        ppName: '',//套餐名称
        ppVerId: '',//套餐VerId
        pdCmpnCode: '',//优惠对象
        pdcode: '',//优惠对象CODE
        pdName: '',//优惠对象名称
        pdCmpnId: ''//优惠信息id
      }
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    if (this.ppDisCount.ppCmpType === '0') {
      this.params.eq_pdInfoId = this.ppDisCount.pdInfoId
    } else {
      this.params.eq_pdInfoId = this.ppDisCount.id
    }
    this.$refs.page.reload()
  },
  created() {
    let _pdppInfo = this.getPdData()
    if (_pdppInfo) {
      Object.assign(this.pdPpInfo, _pdppInfo);
    }
    this.productPpForm.id = this.ppDisCount.id;
    this.productPpForm.ppCode = this.ppDisCount.ppCode;
    this.productPpForm.ppName = this.ppDisCount.ppName;
    this.productPpForm.pdCmpnCode = this.ppDisCount.ppCmpType;
    this.productPpForm.pdcode = this.ppDisCount.pdCode;
    this.productPpForm.pdName = this.ppDisCount.pdName;
    this.productPpForm.pdCmpnId = this.ppDisCount.pdCmpnId;
    this.productPpForm.ppVerId = this.ppDisCount.ppVerId;
    this.params.eq_pdBussId = this.ppDisCount.pdCmpnId;
  },
  methods: {
    formulaViewClosed() {
      this.formulaView.visible = false
      this.selectedFormula = {}
    },
    selectedFormulaChanged() {
      this.formulaView.flag = '2'
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = this.selectedFormula.pdCalcCode
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    /*Formula详情*/
    showFormula(code) {
      this.formulaView.flag = '1'
      this.formulaView.ruleCode = code
      this.formulaView.visible = true
    },
    back() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_pdDiscount', false)
    },
    toSelectFormula() {
      this.$emit('changeDialogVisible_ppDiscountSelect', true)
    },
    handleDeleteFormula(row) {
      deleteDiscountFormula(row).then(() => {
        this.notifySuccess(this.$t('successMessage.delete'))
        this.$emit('bringInCalcCode', row.pdBussId, undefined)
        this.$refs.page.reload()
      })
    }
  }
}

</script>
<style>

</style>
